group_1.textRight: (No!)
(Don't get tempted by her, Sakuya Suzuka!)
(I need to make it very clear that we aren't on@the same side here.)
Okay, think about it, will you? You're from Tokime,@right?

group_1.textLeft: Yup, I fight for the sake of the Land of the Rising@Sun as a Tokime Magical Girl!

group_1.textRight: Yeah.
On the other hand, I'm from Promised Blood.
Which means... your side and mine, as well as@the Kamihama Magia Union,
are each competing for [textYellow:Kimochi] bracelets.
And besides, we Promised Blood...
are different from both Kamihama and Tokime...@in what we have to deal with...!!
...you and I, we're enemies.
Isn't it absurd to expect us to get along and@help each other?
...I mean, sure, we haven't had a full-blown@conflict, yet...
But we may still kill each other someday.
...That's what I'm talking about! Don’t you get it?!
Okay, then... Isn't it absurd to expect us to get@along and help each other?
WHY?!
You have to understand that we're enemies!
Then... Why...

group_1.textLeft: Don’tcha think you’re worrying too much, buddy?
We may kill each other someday, [chara:305801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:305801:eyeClose_1][chara:305801:lipSynch_1]yeah, and if@that happens...
Even I might not be able to say things like "let's@be friends" anymore.
But, that's exactly why we gotta be friends now,@y'know?!

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: If we're gonna be at war in the future...
Then let's become friends now while we still have@the time!
If now is the only time you can hang out then@let's hang out and have fun!
Ain't that a good way of looking at it?

group_1.textCenter: (No, I didn't! I was just explained away by her...)
(About what it means for enemies to become@friends...)
(How I felt when I was battling my best friend...)
(What do I do...? Will she quiet down if I tell her@about that...?)
(If I tell her that, she'll feel sorry for me...)
(No! I don't want to be pitied!)
(All right, if it comes to this...)

group_1.textRight: (Last resort...)
(Run for it!)
